title: Which champion would be your closest friend?
body:
I just felt like doing this because why not :)

Personally for me it would be {{champion:157}}  mainly because I have a 97% play rate as him. Also I really like his character and  phisiophical  personality. I also play the shakuhachi in my down time already so he could teach me a few songs, but apart from that i'd really like to just talk to him and experience his life from his own perspective. Of course i don't condone everything he's
done, and I even think that sometimes he was wrong. But overall I would have his back, and hopefully he would have mine :)

And being honest, it would be pretty bitchin' if he taught  me the wind technique!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I'd like to think it would be {{champion:133}} (and Valor obviously) but it's probably more likely to be {{champion:32}}...

no champs would like you or anyone else that plays this game.
they'd despise you all for wasting your time on video games.
you play yasuos instrument and 97% of your games are of him? sounds desperate af, unless you're a hot chick i wouldnt want a stalker like that lol
